name: Air Combat ‪
description:
A Century of Epic Air Battles.

Dominate the skies and master the world’s most advanced combat aircraft as you experience the best looking.

The game takes you to a variety of beautifully rendered exotic (WW2, modern war, alien invasion) locations to challenge enemies in the battle for air superiority. Along the way you collect medals for your progress which you can use to unlock even more planes.

AMAZING QUALITY.
Unparalleled visuals, special effects and audio including


FEATURES:
• Experience an epic.
• Destroy wave upon wave of enemy aircraft.
• Reaching higher ranks will unlock new planes.
• Next-Gen 3D graphics with Retina Display.
• Gyroscope enabled controls enable full 360-degree flight in 3D space.
• Climb the Game Center leaderboards.

Please send us your impressions and suggestions, help us identify bugs. We want to make your gaming experience the best you’ve ever had. Please visit our support site at www.eddsgames.com
